|website = [http://archetwist.com/en/opera/operator Operator YAPO homepage] }}

'Operator YAPO' (Yet Another Portable Opera) is a portable version of the Opera
web browser. It can be installed on portable data storage devices like
pendrives, USB sticks and hard drives. [http://www.ghacks.net/2007/05/07/opera-tor-and-privoxy-
combined/ gHacks - 'Opera, Tor and Privoxy combined']
